snippet: MUNN--Donald Bruce. July 3, 1940 - December 21, 2015. Son of Catherine and Adam Munn of Bronx, New York, died peacefully on Monday, December 21st at Nazareth Classic Care of Fairfield, CA. Donald was best known for being a sales person extraordinaire. He is survived by his wife of 32 years, Pamela Munn, and his 20 year old daughter Montana Munn. He will be buried with his family in upstate New York. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MUNN--Donald Bruce. July 3, 1940 - December 21, 2015. Son of Catherine and Adam Munn of Bronx, New York, died peacefully on Monday, December 21st at Nazareth Classic Care of Fairfield, CA. Donald was best known for being a sales person extraordinaire. He is survived by his wife of 32 years, Pamela Munn, and his 20 year old daughter Montana Munn. He will be buried with his family in upstate New York. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MUNN, DONALD BRUCE
